title: What are the most innovative digital identity verification solutions available today? - Quora

response.answer_text: Today, many identity verification providers in the market offer agile and accurate online identity verification services. The recent integration of AI-based techniques with online verification solutions has picked up the pace. Fusing human and machine intelligence has opened new doorways for automating tedious verification tasks and cutting on operational costs for financial enterprises. Popular products to remotely verify identity include facial recognition and document verification systems. By incorporating machine learning algorithms to detect facial features, recognition tasks are performed, which makes the verification job less labor-inducive. Document formats and blueprints are learned by intelligent technology to make the process quick, simple, and efficient. These systems not only help to maintain a sound customer experience but mitigates the risk of potentially fraudulent activities as well. Hence, they are an effective and reliable means of knowing your customer's identity and preventing identity theft.

Check these solutions:  Video Face Verification - A ten seconds video of the user is taken in real time, and our patented algorithms compare the claimed user photo to the taken video, in addition to voice matching the video and a random voice challenge. This feature can provide extra confidence that your user is real. Social Network Verification- I Am Real’s proprietary technology enables websites to authenticate the credibility of users and identify fraudulent users by using social network analysis  Disclaimer: I currently work for I Am Real - Building Trust Through Online Identity Verification
